name: Slot Car Race
description:
iSlotCars USA is the ultimate slot car racing simulation game!

Race your car on perfectly engineered realistic slot car tracks all over the world. Compete head on with the computer for the fastest times! You can even design your own tracks with our track design mode!

Race on world-class tracks in the following cities:
- Orlando, Florida
- Williamsburg, Virginia
- Cape Town, South Africa
- London, England
- Zermatt, Switzerland
- Las Vegas, Nevada
- Los Angeles, California
- Canberra, Australia
- Paris, France
- Tokyo, Japan
- Atlantic City, New Jersey
- Sandusky, Ohio
- Rome, Italy
- Shanghai, China
- Monte Carlo, Monaco

A slot car (slotcar) is a powered miniature vehicle that is guided by a groove or slot in the track on which it runs. A pin extends from the bottom of the car into the slot. You control the power of the car with an external controller. The physics of slot car acceleration and even the analog controllers themselves are accurately reproduced with iSlotCars!

iSlotCars features:
- 3 difficulty modes
- Choose any car color you want
- Your fastest times and designed tracks get automatically saved
- Advanced OpenGL graphics
- Music and sound effects
- High-resolution textures
- Made for iPhone 4, iPad, iPhone 3G, 3Gs, and iPod Touch (all versions)

iSlotCars is brought to you by the makers of iRollerCoaster and iBASEjump.

Have fun with iSlotCars and enjoy the ride!
